DOC.brief_title: Xenogenous Collagen Matrix Graft With Without Enamel Matrix Proteins Derivative Root Coverage
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year . Presence least one Class I II Miller gingival recession ≥ 2.5 mm maxillary canine premolar identifiable cementumenamel junction ( CEJ ) without deep noncarious cervical lesion ( < 0.5 mm ) : A + ( PiniPrato et al . 2010 ) . Aesthetic complaint and/or presence dentin hypersensitivity air stimulus . Fullmouth visible plaque index ≤ 20 % ( Ainamo & Bay 1975 ) . Fullmouth sulcus bleed index ≤ 20 % ( Mühlemann & Son 1971 ) . Smoking . Pregnancy . Presence systemic disorder ( diabetes , hypertension , heart disease condition could contraindicate periodontal surgery ) . Use medication ( immunosuppressant , phenytoin anything else might affect mucosal heal repair ) . Previous periodontal surgery area .
